title: 1907 A. C. Dietsche Postcards for sale
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1907 A. C. Dietsche Postcards for sale
posts.post_content:
I have a number of AC Dietsche postcards so I'm not going put up images of them all. They are all graded by SGC except one that I think is a factory miscut as its the only one of the entire set that came up short. PM an offer on any of these that you are interested in.

GEORGE MULLIN - EX 5
JEROME DOWNS - EX 5
WILLIAM DONOVAN - EX 5
EDWARD KILLIAN - EX 5
DAVID JONES - EX 5
WILLIAM COUGHLIN - EX 5
CHARLES O'LEARY - EX 5
EDWARD SIEVER - EX 5
FRED PAYNE - EX 5
HERMAN SCHAEFER - VG+ 3.5 SOLD!
CLAUDE ROSSMAN - Too short to holder

Thanks.
Rest of the lots are headed to eBay tonight. Thanks.
